lines.text: 'Cept for a sore ass. Give me a light will ya, Toby?

You see, there was no way to catch us. Toby also built the escape gimmicks we used in the hills every time you got too close. You sure did look silly drivin' by. I admit I *was* lucky to meet you when no one else was around so I could lay my story on you. Anyway, even if we are caught, we won't ever confess.
